taskDescription: What stereoisomers would result from reaction of (±)-lactic acid with (S)-1-phenylethylamine, and what is the relationship between them?
detailedSolution: Two diastereomeric salts: (R)-lactic acid plus (S)-1-phenylethylamine and (S)-lactic acid plus (S)-1-phenylethylamine
